R

RadialBusyIcon - Class in org.divxdede.swing.busy.icon
BusyIcon drawing a radial progress bar (circle) below the decorated icon
Some methods can be used for customize the LaF of this icon: DecoratorBusyIcon.setDecoratedIcon(Icon) : Define the basic icon to draw RadialBusyIcon.setProgressBarDiameter(int) : Define the diameter of the progress bar (the bar is centered on this icon) RadialBusyIcon.setProgressBarThickness(int) : Define the thickness of the progress bar RadialBusyIcon.setProgressBarBackground(java.awt.Paint) : Define the background color of the progress bar RadialBusyIcon.setProgressBarForeground(java.awt.Paint) : Define the foreground color of the progress bar Theses methods defines some customization of the LaF's icon.
RadialBusyIcon(Icon) - Constructor for class org.divxdede.swing.busy.icon.RadialBusyIcon
Default constructor with the specified decorated icon with an insets of (7,7,7,7)
RadialBusyIcon(Icon, Insets) - Constructor for class org.divxdede.swing.busy.icon.RadialBusyIcon
Default constructor with the specified decorated icon and specified insets.
